  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BBjGridContextMenu
    A class which reprensets grid context menu
    BBjGridContextMenuItem
    A class which reprensetsa grid context menu item
    BBjGridContextMenuPredefinedMenuitem
    A class which represents predefined menu items.
    BBjGridDefaultContextMenu
    A class which reprensets the default grid context menu
    BBjGridExWidget
    An Advanced BBj Data Grid / Data Table Widget
    BBjGridExWidgetAutoGroupColumn
    Allows specifying the group 'auto column' if you are not happy with the default.
    BBjGridExWidgetCellEditorAGLargeText
    Simple editor that uses the standard HTML 'textarea' tag.
    BBjGridExWidgetCellEditorAGPopupText
    Same as BBjGridExWidgetCellEditorAgText but as popup.
    BBjGridExWidgetCellEditorAGText
    Simple text editors that use the standard HTML 'input' tag
    BBjGridExWidgetCellEditorBasicBoolean
    Simple switch button to switch boolean values
    BBjGridExWidgetCellEditorBasicDate
    calander input
    BBjGridExWidgetCellEditorBasicNumber
    Simple number input
    BBjGridExWidgetCellEditorBasicTimestamp
    Timestamp input
    BBjGridExWidgetClientCellModel
    A model for the client cell
    BBjGridExWidgetClientColumnModel
    A model for the client column
    BBjGridExWidgetClientEventsCell
    Cell Editing / Clicking Event
    BBjGridExWidgetClientEventsContextMenu
    Context Menu Event
    BBjGridExWidgetClientEventsRowEditing
    Cell Editing / Clicking Event
    BBjGridExWidgetClientEventsRowSelection
    Row Selection Event (single & double)
    BBjGridExWidgetClientJsonFactory
    The class will create client models from JSON
    BBjGridExWidgetClientRowModel
    A client model for rows
    BBjGridExWidgetColumn
    The class holds the grid column props , it aslo introduces serveral helper methods to update the styles like , fore/back colors.
    BBjGridExWidgetColumnDefinition
    The class holds the common props between column and column groups
    BBjGridExWidgetColumnGroup
    The class holds the grid column group.
    BBjGridExWidgetColumnsManager
    The class is a direct implementation for BBjGridExWidgetColumnsManagerInterface and it defines the common logic for all methods
    BBjGridExWidgetColumnsToolpanel
    Columns Toolpanel
    BBjGridExWidgetDefaultColumnDefinition
    The class reprensets the default column defintion which the grid will use.
    BBjGridExWidgetDefaultColumnGroup
    The class holds the default grid column group.
    BBjGridExWidgetDefaultSidebar
    A class to define the default implementation of the grid sidebar
    BBjGridExWidgetExpression
    BBjGridExWidgetExpression
    BBjGridExWidgetExpressionDatesFormatter
    The class defines a grid expression to format date/timestamps according to BBj supported masks
    BBjGridExWidgetExpressionNumbersFormatter
    The class defines a grid expression to format numbers according to BBj supported masks
    BBjGridExWidgetFilterAGDate
    The class represents the defualt ag-grid date filter
    BBjGridExWidgetFilterAGNumber
    The class represents the defualt ag-grid number filter
    BBjGridExWidgetFilterAGText
    The class represents the defualt ag-grid text filter
    BBjGridExWidgetFilterBasicBoolean
    The class represents the boolean filter
    BBjGridExWidgetFilterBasicDate
    The class represents the date filter
    BBjGridExWidgetFilterBasicTimestamp
    The class represents the timestamp filter
    BBjGridExWidgetFiltersToolpanel
    A class which represents the filters toolpanel
    BBjGridExWidgetLanguageManager
    BBjGridExWidgetLanguageManager.bbj The language manager will add , remove language files to the grid.
    BBjGridExWidgetRendererBoolean
    The class reprensets a boolean cell renderer
    BBjGridExWidgetRendererCustomHTML
    The class can render a custom html using lodash string templates.
    BBjGridExWidgetRendererGroupCellRenderer
    If you are grouping in the grid, then you will need to provide a group cell renderer as the group cell renderer is what provides the user with the expand and collapse functionality.
    BBjGridExWidgetRendererImageRenderer
    The renderer can be used to dispaly a list of images based on the cells values using a json object
    BBjGridExWidgetSidebar
    The class manages the grid sidebar and its toolpanels
    BBjGridExWidgetState
    This file is part of the BBjGridExWidget plugin.
    BBjGridExWidgetStatusBar
    BBjGridExWidgetStatusBar BBjGridExWidget status bar manager.
    BBjGridExWidgetStatusBarComponent
    An Abstract implementation for BBjGridExWidgetStatusBarComponentInterface
    BBjGridExWidgetStatusBarFilteredRowCountComponent
    A statusbar component which provides the filtered row count.
    BBjGridExWidgetStatusBarSelectedRowCountComponent
    A statusbar component which provides the selected row count
    BBjGridExWidgetStatusBarTotalAndFilteredRowCountComponent
    A statusbar component which provides the total and filtered row count.
    BBjGridExWidgetStatusBarTotalRowCountComponent
    A statusbar component which provides the total row count.
    BBjGridExWidgetToolpanel
    An abtract class which represents a toolpanel which can be attached to a sidebar
